name: music-microservice
description: A services that adds all of your audio files in an S3 bucket to a DynamoDB database. A service that allows a user to search for a song(the name of the file) or returns a list of all of the songs(files) you have in your S3 bucket. A service that allows you to create a new playlist and add a song to that playlist.(You might want to use a second DynamoDB table for this)
